pe2:1.2: Sankilesabhagiyam suttam, vasanabhagiyam suttam, nibbedhabhagiyam suttam, asekkhabhagiyam suttam, sankilesabhagiyanca vasanabhagiyanca, sankilesabhagiyanca nibbedhabhagiyanca, sankilesabhagiyanca nibbedhabhagiyanca asekkhabhagiyanca, vasanabhagiyanca nibbedhabhagiyanca.
pe2:1.3: Anatti, phalam, upayo, anatti ca phalanca, phalanca upayo ca, anatti ca phalanca upayo ca.
pe2:1.4: Assado, adinavo, nissaranam, assado ca adinavo ca, assado ca nissarananca, adinavo ca nissarananca, assado ca adinavo ca nissarananca.
pe2:8.1: Mahanamassa sakkassa idam bhagava sakyanam kapilavatthumhi nagare nayavittharena saddhasilaparibhavitam suttam bhavannena paribhavitam tam nama pacchime kale.
pe2:11.1: Silani nu kho bhavanti kimatthiyani anando pucchati sattharam.
pe2:14.1: Sariputto nama bhagava therannataro so mam asajja appatinissajja carikam pakkamati, sariputtassa byakaranam katabbam.
pe2:14.2: Yassa nuna bhagava kayagata sati abhavita assa abahulikata vittharena katabbam.
pe2:17.4: Tattha yo ca tamo yo ca tamaparayano, ayam sankileso.
pe2:17.5: Yo ca joti yo ca jotiparayano, ayam vasana.
pe2:20.1: Na tam dalham bandhanamahu dhira, yada puttesu daresu ca ya apekkha, ayam sankileso.
pe2:20.2: Etampi chetva paribbajanti dhira anapekkhino sabbakame pahayati, ayam nibbedho.
pe2:20.3: Yam cetayitam pakappitam ya ca namarupassa avakkanti hoti.
pe2:21.1: Tattha katamam sankilesabhagiyanca nibbedhabhagiyanca asekkhabhagiyanca suttam?
pe2:24.1: Ye hi keci samana va brahmana va bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhamahamsu, sabbete “avippamutta bhavasma”ti vadami.
pe2:24.2: Ye va pana keci samana va brahmana va vibhavena bhavassa nissaranamahamsu, sabbete “anissata bhavasma”ti vadami.
pe2:24.3: Upadhim hi paticca dukkhamidam sambhoti, sabbupadanakkhaya natthi dukkhassa sambhavo, lokamimam passa, puthu avijjaya pareta bhuta bhutarata bhava aparimutta.
pe2:24.4: Ye hi keci bhava sabbadhi sabbatthataya sabbete bhava anicca dukkha viparinamadhammati.
pe2:27.1: Ayam loko santapajato yava dukkhanti yam tanha sankileso.
pe2:28.1: Yam punaggahanam ye hi keci samana va brahmana va bhavena bhavassa vimokkhamahamsu, sabbete “avimutta bhavasma”ti vadami.
pe2:28.2: Ye va pana keci samana va brahmana va vibhavena bhavassa nissaranamahamsu “anissata bhavasma”ti vadami.
pe2:28.3: Ayam ditthisankileso, tam ditthisankileso ca tanhasankileso ca, ubhayametam sankileso.
pe2:28.4: Yam punaggahanam bhavavippahanaya brahmacariyam vussati, yava sabbaso upadanakkhaya sambhava, idam nibbedhabhagiyam.
pe2:28.5: Tassa nibbutassa bhikkhuno yava upaccaga sabbabhavani taditi idam asekkhabhagiyam.
pe2:28.6: Cattaro puggala anusotagami sankileso thitatto ca patisotagami ca nibbedho.
pe2:31.1: “Dadato punnam pavaddhati, samyamato veram na ciyati”ti vasana.
pe2:31.2: “Kusalo ca jahati papakam, ragadosamohakkhaya sanibbuto”ti nibbedho.
pe2:32.1: Sotanugatesu dhammesu vacasa paricitesu manasanupekkhitesu ditthiya suppatividdhesu pancanisamsa patikankha.
pe2:32.2: Idhekaccassa bahussuta dhamma honti dhata apamuttha vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha, so yunjanto ghatento vayamanto dittheva dhamme visesam pappoti.
pe2:32.3: No ce dittheva dhamme visesam pappoti, gilano pappoti.
pe2:32.4: No ce gilano pappoti, maranakalasamaye pappoti.
pe2:32.5: No ce maranakalasamaye pappoti, devabhuto papunati.
pe2:32.6: No ce devabhuto papunati, tena dhammaragena taya dhammanandiya paccekabodhim papunati.
pe2:33.1: Tatthayam dittheva dhamme papunati, ayam nibbedho.
pe2:33.2: Yam samparaye paccekabodhim papunati, ayam vasana.
pe2:33.3: Imani solasa suttani sabbasasanam atigganhanto titthanti.
pe2:33.4: Imehi solasahi suttehi navavidho suttanto vibhatto bhavati.
pe2:33.5: So ca pannavato no duppannassa, yuttassa no ayuttassa, akammassa viharissa pakatiya loke sankileso carati.
pe2:33.8: Tato sankilesato utthahanto sankileso dhammesu patitthahati, lokiyesu patitthahatiti.
pe2:33.9: Tatthakusalo ditthato sace tam silanca ditthinca paramasati, tassa so tanhasankileso hoti.
pe2:33.10: Sace panassa evam hoti “iminaham silena va vatena va brahmacariyena va devo va bhavissam devannataro va”ti yassa hoti micchaditthi, etassa micchaditthisankileso bhavati.
pe2:33.11: Sace pana sile patitthito aparamatthassa hi silavatam hoti, tassa tam silavato yoniso gahitam avippatisaram janeti yava vimuttinanadassanam, tanca tassa dittheva dhamme kalankatassa va tamhiyeva va pana aparapariyayena va, annesu khandhesu evam sutam “sucaritam vasanaya samvattati”ti vasanabhagiyam suttam vuccati.
pe2:33.12: Tattha silesu thitassa vinivaranam cittam, tam tato sakkayaditthippahanaya bhagava dhammam deseti.
pe2:33.14: yadi va sasanantare, accantam nibbanam papunati, yadi va ekasane cha abhinne.
pe2:33.15: Tattha dve puggala ariyadhamme papunanti saddhanusari ca dhammanusari ca.
pe2:33.21: Tattha yo ca ugghatitannu mudindriyo, yo ca neyyo tikkhindriyo, ime puggala asamindriya honti.
pe2:33.22: Tattha ime puggala samindriya parihayanti ca ugghatitannuto, vipancitannu neyyato, ime majjhima bhumigata vipancitannu hoti.
pe2:34.1: Tattha catuttha pana pancama ugghatitannu vipancitannu neyyo ca, tattha ugghatitannu puggalo indriyani patilabhitva dassanabhumiyam thito sotapattiphalanca papunati, ekabiji hoti pathamo sotapanno.
pe2:34.2: Tattha vipancitannu puggalo indriyani patilabhitva dassanabhumiyam thito sotapattiphalanca papunati, kolankolo ca hoti dutiyo sotapanno.
pe2:34.3: Tattha neyyo puggalo indriyani patilabhitva dassanabhumiyam thito sotapattiphalanca papunati, sattakkhattuparamo ca hoti, ayam tatiyo sotapanno.
pe2:34.4: Ime tayo puggala indriyavemattataya sotapattiphale thita.
pe2:35.1: Ugghatitannu ekabiji hoti, vipancitannu kolankolo hoti, neyyo sattakkhattuparamo hoti.
pe2:35.3: Sace pana taduttari vayamati, accantanittham nibbanam papunati.
pe2:35.4: Tattha ugghatitannu puggalo yo tikkhindriyo, te dve puggala honti—
pe2:35.5: anagamiphalam papunitva antaraparinibbayi ca upahaccaparinibbayi ca.
pe2:35.6: Tattha vipancitannu puggalo yo tikkhindriyo, te dve puggala honti—
pe2:35.7: anagamiphalam papunanti asankharaparinibbayi ca sasankharaparinibbayi ca.
pe2:35.8: Tattha neyyo anagamiphalam papunanto uddhamsoto akanitthagami hoti, ugghatitannu ca vipancitannu ca, indriyananattena ugghatitannu puggalo tikkhindriyo antaraparinibbayi hoti, ugghatitannu mudindriyo uddhamsoto akanitthagami hoti.
pe2:35.9: Ugghatitannu ca vipancitannu ca indriyananattena ugghatitannu puggalo tikkhindriyo sasankharaparinibbayi hoti, tikkhindriyo antaraparinibbayi hoti, ugghatitannu mudindriyo upahaccaparinibbayi hoti.
pe2:35.10: Vipancitannu tikkhindriyo asankharaparinibbayi hoti, vipancitannu mudindriyo sasankharaparinibbayi hoti, neyyo upahaccaparinibbayi hoti, vipancitannu tikkhindriyo asankharaparinibbayi hoti.
pe2:35.11: Vipancitannu mudindriyo sasankharaparinibbayi hoti, neyyo uddhamsoto akanitthagami hoti.
pe2:35.12: Iti panca anagamino, chattho sakadagami, tayo ca sotapannati ime nava sekkha.
pe2:36.1: Tattha ugghatitannu puggalo tikkhindriyo arahattam papunanto dve puggala honti ubhatobhagavimutto pannavimutto ca.
pe2:36.2: Tattha ugghatitannu puggalo mudindriyo arahattam papunanto dve puggala honti, thitakappi ca pativedhanabhavo ca.
pe2:36.3: Tattha vipancitannu puggalo ca tikkhindriyo so arahattam papunanto dve puggala honti cetanabhabbo ca rakkhanabhabbo ca.
pe2:36.4: Tattha vipancitannu mudindriyo arahattam papunanto dve puggala honti, sace ceteti na parinibbayi, no ce ceteti parinibbayiti.
pe2:36.5: Sace anurakkhati na parinibbayi, no ce anurakkhati parinibbayiti.
pe2:36.6: Tattha neyyo puggalo bhavananuyogamanuyutto parihanadhammo hoti kammaniyato va samasisi va, ime nava arahanto idam catubbidham suttam sankilesabhagiyam asekkhabhagiyam.
pe2:36.7: Imesu puggalesu tathagatassa dasavidham balam pavattati.
pe2:37.2: Idha buddhanam bhagavantanam appavattite dhammacakke mahesakkha devaputta yacanaya abhiyata honti “desetu sugato dhamman”ti.
pe2:37.3: So anuttarena buddhacakkhuna volokento addasasi sattanam tayo rasinam sammattaniyato micchattaniyato aniyato.
pe2:37.4: Tattha sammattaniyato rasi micchasatim apajjeyyati netam thanam vijjati, asatthuko parinibbayeyyati netam thanam vijjati, samapattim apajjeyyati thanametam vijjati.
pe2:37.5: Tattha micchattaniyato rasi ariyasamapattim patipajjissatiti netam thanam vijjati, anariyamicchapatipattim patipajjissatiti thanametam vijjati.
pe2:37.6: Tattha aniyato rasi sammapatipajjamanam sammattaniyatarasim gamissatiti thanametam vijjati, micchapatipajjamano sammattaniyatarasim gamissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
pe2:37.7: Sammapatipajjamanam sammattaniyatarasim gamissatiti thanametam vijjati, micchapatipajjamanam micchattaniyatarasim gamissatiti thanametam vijjati.
pe2:37.8: Ime tayo anuttarena buddhacakkhuna volokentassa sammasambuddhassa me sato ime dhamma anabhisambuddhati ettavata mam koci sahadhammena paticodissatiti netam thanam vijjati, vitaragassa te patijanato akhinasavataya sahadhammena koci paticodissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
pe2:37.9: Yato pana imassa aniyatassa rasissa dhammadesana, sa na dissati takkarassa sammadukkhakkhayayati netam thanam vijjati, tatha ovadito yam pana me aniyatarasi savako pubbenaparam visesam na sacchikarissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
pe2:38.1: Yam kho muni nanappakarassa nananiruttiyo devanagayakkhanam dameti dhamme vavatthanena vatva karanato annam param gamissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
pe2:38.3: Yato panima niruttito satta satta niruttiyo nabhisambhuneyyati netam thanam vijjati.
pe2:38.5: Nirutti kho pana abhisamaggaratanam savakanam tamatthamavinnapayeti netam thanam vijjati.
pe2:38.8: Kayikena va manasikena va paripilitassa hatthakuniti va pade va khanje dandhassa so attho na paribhajiyatiti netam thanam vijjati.
pe2:38.10: Yamhi tam tesam hoti tamhi asantam bhavatiti netam thanam vijjati.
pe2:38.11: Yam hi nasam tesam na bhavati, tamhi nasam tesam bhavissatiti netam thanam vijjati.
pe2:38.13: Maro va indo va brahma va tathagato va cakkavatti va so vata nama matugamo bhavissatiti netam thanam vijjati, puriso assa raja cakkavatti sakko devanamindo bhavissatiti thanametam vijjati.
pe2:38.14: Itissa evarupam balam evarupam nanam, idam vuccati thanatthanananam pathamam tathagatabalam tam niddisitabbam.
pe2:38.15: Tihi rasihi catuhi vesarajjehi catuhi patisambhidahi paticcasamuppadassa pavattiyam nivattiyam bhagiyanca.
pe2:38.16: Kusalam kusalavipakesu ca upapajjati yanca itthipurisanam.
pe2:38.17: Idam pathamam balam tathagato evam janati.
pe2:39.1: Yesam pana sammattaniyato rasi, nayam sabbatthagamini patipada, nibbanagaminiyevayam patipada.
pe2:39.2: Tattha siya micchattaniyato rasi, esapi na sabbatthagamini patipada.
pe2:39.3: Sakkayasamudayagaminiyevayam patipada hotu, ayam tattha tattha patipattiya thito gacchati nibbanam, gacchati apayam, gacchati devamanussassa.
pe2:39.4: Yam yam va patipadam patipajjeyya sabbattha gaccheyya, ayam sabbatthagamini patipada.
pe2:39.5: Yam ettha nanam yathabhutam, idam vuccati sabbatthagamini patipadananam dutiyam tathagatabalam.
pe2:40.1: Sa kho panayam sabbatthagamini patipada nanadhimutta keci kamesu keci dukkarakariyam keci attakilamathanuyogamanuyutta keci samsarena suddhim paccenti keci anajjabhavanati.
pe2:40.2: Tena tena caritena vinibandhanam sattanam yam nanam yathabhutam nanagatam lokassa anekadhimuttagatam yathabhutam pajanati.
pe2:41.1: Tattha sattanam adhimutta bhavanti asevanti bhaventi bahulikaronti.
pe2:41.4: Katara panesa dhatu nekkhammadhatu baladhatu kaci sampatti kaci micchattanca dhatu adhimutta bhavanti.
pe2:41.6: Te tadevatthanam maya jaramaranassa abhinivissa voharanti “idameva saccam moghamannan”ti.
pe2:42.1: Tattha yamyeva dhatu setthanti tam tam kayena ca vacaya ca arambhanti cetasiko.
pe2:42.2: Arambho cetana kammam kayika vacasika arambho cetasikatta kammantaram tathagato evam pajanati “imina sattena evam dhatukena evarupam kammam katam, tam atitamaddhanam imina hetuna tassa evarupo vipako vipaccati etarahi vipaccissati va anagatamaddhanan”ti.
pe2:42.3: Evam paccuppannamaddhanam pajanati “ayam puggalo evamdhatuko idam kammam karoti.
pe2:42.4: Tanhaya ca ditthiya ca imina hetuna na tassa vipako dittheyeva dhamme nibbattissati, upapajje va”ti aparamhi va pariyaye evam pajanati “ayam puggalo evarupam kammam karissati anagatamaddhanam, imina hetuna tassa evarupo vipako nibbattissati, imina hetuna yani cattari kammatthanani idam kammatthanam paccuppannasukham ayatim ca sukhavipakam” …pe…
pe2:42.5: iti ayam atitanagatapaccuppannanam kammasamadananam hetuso thanaso vipakavemattatam pajanati uccavaca hinapanitata, idam vuccati kammavipakananam pancamam tathagatabalam.
pe2:43.1: Tatha satta yam va kammasamadanam samadiyanta tattha evam pajanati imassa puggalassa kammadhimuttassa ragacaritassa nekkhammadhatunam paripurim gacchanti, tassa raganugate sunnamanassa pathamam jhanam sankilissati, sace puna uttari vayamato jhanavodanagate manase visesabhagiyam patipadam anuyunjiyati.
pe2:43.2: Tassa hi jhanabhagiyamyeva pathamajjhane thitassa dutiyam jhanam vodanam gacchati, tatiyanca jhanam samapajjitukamassa somanassindriyam cittam pariyadaya titthati, tassa sa piti avisesabhagiyam tatiyam jhanam adissa titthati.
pe2:43.4: Tathagatassa catutthajjhanam vodanam gacchatiyeva, catutthassa jhanassa hanabhagiya dhamma, te ca dhamma yattha pajayanti yehi catutthajjhanam vodanam dissati.
pe2:43.5: Evam ajjhasayasamapattiya ya catasso samapattiyo tini vimokkhamukhani attha vimokkhajhananiti cattari jhanani vimokkhati.
pe2:43.6: Attha ca vimokkha tini ca vimokkhamukhani.
pe2:43.9: Samapattiyo catasso ajjhasayasamapattiyo iti imesam jhananam vimokkhasamapattiti evarupo sankileso ragacaritassa puggalassa.
pe2:43.10: Evam dosacaritassa … mohacaritassa … ragacaritassa puggalassa evarupam vodanam iti yam ettha nanam yathabhutam asadharanam sabbasattehi.
pe2:44.1: Tattha tathagato evam pajanati lokika dhamma lokuttara dhamma bhavanabhagiyam indriyam namam labhanti.
pe2:44.2: Adhipateyyabhumim upadaya balam namam labhanti thamagatam mano manindriyam tam upadaya.
pe2:44.4: Itissa deva evarupam nanam imehi ca dhammehi ime puggala samannagatatipi dhammadesanam akasi.
pe2:44.5: Akarato ca vokarato ca asayajjhasayassa adhimuttisamannagatanam.
pe2:44.6: Idam vuccati parasattanam parapuggalanam indriyabalaviriyavemattatam nanam sattamam tathagatabalam.
pe2:45.1: Tattha ca tathagato lokadisu ca bhumisu samyojanananca sekkhanam dvihi balehi gatim pajanati, pubbenivasanussatiya atite samsare etarahi ca paccuppanne dibbacakkhuna cutupapatam iti imani dve balani dibbacakkhuto abhinihitani.
pe2:45.2: So atitamaddhanam dibbassa cakkhuno gocaro so etarahi sati gocaro iti attano ca paresam ca pubbenivasananam anekavidham nanappakarakam paccuppannamaddhanam dibbena cakkhuna imani dve tathagatabalani, atthamam pubbenivaso, navamam dibbacakkhu.
pe2:46.1: Puna caparam tathagato ariyapuggalanam jhanam vodanam nibbedhabhagiyam pajanati ayam puggalo imina maggena imaya patipadaya asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sacchikatva upasampajja viharatiti iti attano ca asavanam khayam nanam ditthekatthanam catubhumimupadaya yava navannam arahantanam asavakkhayo odhiso sekkhanam anodhiso arahantanam.
pe2:46.2: Tattha cetovimutti dvihi asavehi anasava kamasavena ca bhavasavena ca, pannavimutti dvihi asavehi anasava ditthasavena ca avijjasavena ca, imasam dvinnam vimuttinam yathabhutam nanam, idam vuccati asavakkhaye nanam.
pe2:47.1: Imesu dasasu balesu thito tathagato pancavidham sasanam deseti sankilesabhagiyam vasanabhagiyam dassanabhagiyam bhavanabhagiyam asekkhabhagiyam.
pe2:47.2: Tattha yo tanhasankileso, imassa alobho nissaranam.
pe2:47.4: Yo duccaritasankileso, imassa tini kusalani nissaranam.
pe2:47.8: Tattha abhijjha manoduccaritam kayakammam upatthapeti, adinnadanam sabbanca tadupanibbaddham vacakammam upatthapeti, musavadanca sabbavitatham sabbam vacamabhavam sabbamakkham palasam abhijjha akusalamulanti, sucarite sucaritam musavada adinnadana abhijjhaya cetana, tattha byapado manoduccaritam kayakammam upatthapeti, panatipatam sabbanca metam akaddhanam parikaddhanam nibbaddham rocanam vacakammam upatthapeti, pisunavacam pharusavacam micchaditthi manoduccaritanca abhijjham byapadam micchaditthim payojeti, tassa yo koci micchaditthi cago ragajo va dosajo va sabbaso micchaditthi sambhuto imina karanena micchaditthim upatthapeti, kamesumicchacaram vacikammam upatthapeti samphappalapam.
pe2:48.5: Tesu gahitesu tisu akusalamulesu dasavidham akusalamulam paripurim gacchati, tassa tividhassa duccaritasankilesassa vasanabhagiyanca suttam nissaranam.
pe2:48.6: Tattha yo bahusito niddeso yatha lobho doso mohopi, tattha asitum ettha lobho ussado tena karanena tesu va dhammesu lobho pannapiyati.
pe2:48.7: Tatthayam moho akusalam moho ayam avijja, sa catubbidha rupe abhinivittha, rupam attato samanupassati, avijjagato rupavantam attanam, attani va rupam, rupasmim va attanam.
pe2:48.8: Tattha katamam padam sakkayaditthiya ucchedam vadati “tam jivam tam sariran”ti natthikaditthi adhiccasamuppannaditthi ca anno ca karoti, anno patisamvediyati.
pe2:48.9: Pacchimasatthikappanam tini padani sakkayaditthiya sassatam bhajanti “annam jivam annam sariran”ti akiriyanca tam dukkhamicchato ahetuka ca patanti anajjhabhavo ca kammanam sabbanca manayi.
pe2:48.10: Tattha “idameva saccam moghamannan”ti samsarena suddhi ajivaka chalasiti pannapenti.
pe2:48.11: Yatharupe sakkayaditthiya catuvatthuka, evam pancasu khandhesu visativatthuka sakkayaditthiya sassatam bhajati.
pe2:48.12: Annajivaka ca sassatavadike ca silabbatam bhajanti paramasanti imina bhavissami devo va devannataro va, ayam silabbataparamaso.
pe2:48.13: Tattha sakkayaditthiya so rupam attato samanupassati, “tam jivam tam sariram”iti tam kankhati vicikicchati nadhimuccati nabhippasidati pubbante aparante pubbantaparante …pe…
pe2:49.1: Tattha saddhindriyena sabbam vicikicchitam pajahati, pannindriyena udayabbayam passati, samadhindriyena cittam ekodi karoti viriyindriyena arabhati.
pe2:49.2: So imehi pancahi indriyehi saddhanusari aveccappasade nirato anantariyam samadhim uppadeti.
pe2:49.3: Indriyehi suddhehi dhammanusari appaccayataya anantariyam samadhim uppadeti.
pe2:49.6: Tassa pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam tini samyojanani dassanapahatabbani sabbena sabbam pahinani dve puggalakatani.
pe2:49.7: Tattha tini akusalamulani bhavanapahatabbani uparikkhittani cha bhave nibbattenti.
pe2:49.8: Tattha tesu abhijjhaya ca byapadesu tanukatesu cha bhava parikkhaya mariyadam gacchanti, dve bhava avasittha.
pe2:49.9: Tassa abhijjha ca byapado ca sabbena sabbam parikkhina honti.
pe2:49.12: Kincapi ettha annepi cattaro kilesa ruparago bhavarago avijja uddhaccam ketusmimanabhuta nappatibala asmimanam vinivattetum, sabbepi te asmimanassa pahanam arabhate.
pe2:49.13: Khinesu na ca tesu idamuttaridassanabhumiyam pancasu sekkhapuggalesu tisu ca patippannakesu dvisu ca phalatthesu bhavanabhagiyam suttam.
pe2:49.16: Tinnam puggalanam desitam puthujjanassa sekkhassa asekkhassa sankilesabhagiyam vasanabhagiyam.
pe2:49.22: Tanca kho sankhepena pannasaya akarehi sampatati, ye pannasa akara sasane niddittha, te sankhipiyanta dasahi akarehi patanti.
pe2:49.23: Ye ariyasaccam nikkhepena thite sankhipiyatta atthasu akaresu patanti.
pe2:49.24: Catusu ca sadharanesu suttesu ya harasampatassa bhumi, te sankhipiyanta pancasu suttesu patanti.
pe2:49.25: Sankilesabhagiye vasanabhagiye bhavanabhagiye nibbedhabhagiye asekkhabhagiye ca.
pe2:49.28: Te sankhipiyamana tisu suttesu patanti, puthujjanabhagiye sekkhabhagiye asekkhabhagiye ca.
pe2:49.29: Te sankhipiyanta dvisu suttesu patanti nibbedhabhagiye ca pubbayogabhagiye ca.
pe2:49.30: Yatha vuttam bhagavata dve atthavase sampassamana tathagata arahanto sammasambuddha dhammam desenti suttam geyyam …pe…
pe2:49.31: sattha pubbayogasamannagate appakasirena mannamana vasiyanti pubbayoga ca bhavissanti santanam mannamanadharaya.
pe2:49.32: Tattha pannavemattatam attano samanupassamanena atthavidhe suttasankhepe, yattha yattha sakkoti, tattha tattha yojetabbam.
pe2:49.33: Tattha tattha yojetva suttassa attho niddisitabbo.
pe2:49.34: Na hi sati vedana mano dharetva sakka yena kenaci suttassa attho yathabhutam niddisitum.

pe2:87.2: Yam khippanca paramam santim nibbanamadhigacchati, idam nissaranam.

pe2:88.2: Sace agarasma anagariyam pabbajati sabbena oghena nissaranam ayam assado ca nissarananca.

pe2:92.3: Yo gedham natva abhinikkhamati yava puranakaya rajadhaniya, idam nissaranam.
